category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMToolCheckLevel
preference.preference_description: Defines what level of tool parameter checking is performed during Manufacturing Resource Manager save operations. Valid Values: "none": Suppresses all tool parameter checking during the save operation. "errors": Only checks for tool parameters that are mandatory but missing. "all": Also reports optional tool parameters that are not set, in addition to the errors.
